events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your experience with software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your candidacy going forward.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully, and we appreciated your detailed answers regarding software engineering best practices.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed to the next stage with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 3 PM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills and knowledge in software development.
We have arranged your HR interview for Friday at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview concluded successfully, and they appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position. Please review the offer details and provide your feedback.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are happy that the terms meet your expectations.
We acknowledge and appreciate your acceptance of the offer. Welcome to the team!
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive instructions for training and system access shortly.
The hiring process is now complete. We look forward to your contributions as part of our engineering team.
